reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is an excellent professor. Her lectures are engaging and she explains complex topics clearly.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee is very knowledgeable. His classes are challenging but rewarding if you put in the effort.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson is passionate about biology, but sometimes her lectures can be a bit too fast-paced.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson knows his stuff, but his teaching style is not very engaging. The material is hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is very approachable and willing to help outside of class. Her exams are fair.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Harris is knowledgeable, but his lectures can be a bit dry. Readings are essential to do well.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is an amazing professor. She makes psychology interesting and her exams are straightforward.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Evans encourages deep thinking and class discussions. His grading can be tough but fair.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson's lectures are informative, but her exams are very difficult. You need to study a lot.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Clark is very passionate about literature. His classes are enjoyable, but be prepared for a lot of reading.

reviews.subject: Physics 101
reviews.review: Dr. Smith explains concepts clearly, but her exams are quite challenging.

reviews.subject: Mathematics 201
reviews.review: Excellent professor! Makes difficult topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Chemistry 101
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is knowledgeable, but sometimes goes too fast during lectures.

reviews.subject: History 202
reviews.review: His lectures are dry, and he doesn't engage the class much.

reviews.subject: English Literature 150
reviews.review: Her passion for literature is contagious, and she encourages great class discussions.

reviews.subject: Biology 101
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable, but his grading can be a bit harsh.

reviews.subject: Philosophy 101
reviews.review: Incredible professor who makes you think deeply about the material.

reviews.subject: Computer Science 101
reviews.review: He knows his stuff, but his teaching style is not very engaging.

reviews.subject: Art History 101
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is passionate about art, but sometimes goes off on tangents.

reviews.subject: Political Science 101
reviews.review: He doesn't provide clear explanations, making it hard to follow along.

reviews.subject: Psychology 101
reviews.review: Fantastic professor! Makes every class interesting and relevant.

reviews.subject: Sociology 201
reviews.review: Great professor with interesting insights, but his exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Economics 101
reviews.review: She's knowledgeable, but her lectures can be monotonous.

reviews.subject: Anthropology 101
reviews.review: Very engaging and well-organized lectures. I learned a lot.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science 101
reviews.review: Dr. Hall is passionate about the environment and makes the subject fascinating.

reviews.subject: Statistics 101
reviews.review: He knows the material well, but his lectures are a bit dry.

reviews.subject: Engineering 101
reviews.review: Dr. King is a great professor, but she moves through the material quickly.

reviews.subject: Marketing 101
reviews.review: His lectures lack structure and can be confusing at times.

reviews.subject: Music Theory 101
reviews.review: Amazing professor with a deep understanding of music. Highly recommend!

reviews.subject: Astronomy 101
reviews.review: Interesting lectures, but his exams are harder than expected.
